sourcesContent: .article-container { max-width: 900px; margin: 50px auto; padding: 30px; background: white; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); text-align: center; } .article-title { font-size: 28px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 10px; } .article-subtitle { font-size: 20px; color: #666; margin-bottom: 20px; } .article-cover { width: 100%; border-radius: 10px; margin-bottom: 20px; } .article-content { text-align: left; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.8; color: #333; } .article-content h3 { font-size: 22px; margin: 20px 0; color: #333; } .article-content p { margin: 10px 0; } .article-img { width: 80%; border-radius: 10px; margin: 20px 0; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } .quote { font-size: 18px; font-style: italic; color: #555; padding: 15px; background: #f7f7f7; border-left: 4px solid #ff4500; margin: 20px 0; } .divider { width: 50%; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(to right, #ff7e5f, #feb47b); border: none; margin: 30px auto; }
